title: Data Cleaning
format: typst

Read csv:
```{r} 
install.packages("tidyverse")
library(tidyverse) 

input_file <- "data/g24_sov_by_g24_svprec.csv" 
output_file <- "g24_sov_by_g24_svprec_cleaned.csv"

raw_votes <- read_csv(input_file, show_col_types = FALSE) 
```

rows 1-1174 are county 1 

clean csv:
```{r}
    clean_svprec <- svp_rec |>
        filter(ADDIST ! = 0)
